function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Panic buying of essential goods leading to scarcity and price increases","Impact":"Scarcity, price increases, and stockouts","Mitigation":"Implement purchase limits, increase production, and regulate prices","Technologies":"Inventory management systems, price monitoring software","People":"Consumers, retailers, and suppliers","Owner":"Retailers, suppliers, and regulatory authorities"},{"Description":"Violence and altercations in retail spaces due to panic buying","Impact":"Physical harm, safety concerns, and escalations of conflict","Mitigation":"Security measures, public education, and conflict resolution training","Technologies":"CCTV, security alarms, and emergency response systems","People":"Retail staff, consumers, and law enforcement","Owner":"Retailers, law enforcement, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Medical and psychological maladies due to stress and isolation","Impact":"Health issues, mental health concerns, and reduced well-being","Mitigation":"Psychological support, stress management programs, and social connection initiatives","Technologies":"Telemedicine, mental health apps, and online support groups","People":"Consumers, healthcare professionals, and community support groups","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations, and employers"}]}
